text:
@Jim_Jordan Luddites don't believe educating the people helps them. So, $300m for public education campaign against coronavirus is wrong.
Alternative energy investment is frowned upon because luddites believe fossil fuels will last forever. They might, but luddites must die & rot first.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
